content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle marks a groove with a downward slope of approximately 45° within the X-Z plane. Mathematically, it follows the equation \( z = -x \), indicating that the groove descends along the x-axis into the z-direction, resulting in negative coupling.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [175, 0, -75],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [-75, 0, 175]
  ]
}
```
